StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetMEPCOMRaceCategories]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
AS
SELECT MRC.RACE_CATEGORY_CODE, MRC.RACE_CATEGORY_CODE + ' - ' + MRC.RACE_CATEGORY_DESC AS RACE_CATEGORY_DESC FROM MEPCOM_RACE_CATEGORY MRC WHERE RACE_CATEGORY_CODE != 'F' ORDER BY ISNUMERIC(MRC.RACE_CATEGORY_CODE), MRC.RACE_CATEGORY_DESC
